channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Over 4000-Year-Old Mummies Had Atherosclerotic Heart Disease
item.description: CT scans of 237 adult mummies found evidence of atherosclerosis in 37.6% of them, as described by a recent publication in the European Heart Journal.

item.description: The best Godzilla movie in years is about to release on streaming.

item.title: How To Pair Two Apple HomePod minis For 2-Channel Stereo Sound
